content:
It's all about the data view but you cannot change the current data view, so create a new one that only you can use! Then try clicking the field name you want to render in a special way on the left side of Discover and then click edit (Edit data view field pops up).

Here are the docs, even though they didn't help me much: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/kibana/8.16/managing-data-views.html#field-formatters-date
